definition: A fast and efficient method of transporting goods or packages, typically used when time is of the essence and prompt delivery is required. It is commonly employed in the context of shipping or logistics to ensure expedited delivery of items.

examples.english: The express shipping is very fast.

examples.german: Wir bieten Expressversand in die ganze Welt an.
Der Expressversand ist nur f체r bestimmte Produkte verf체gbar.
examples.english: The express shipping is only available for certain products.
